seo.title: MASO - RENAPROV | Together, let's break the cycle of poverty
seo.description: MASO is an initiative of RENAPROV FINANCE SA that empowers Cameroonians through solidarity. Benefit from direct advantages in health, education and social assistance.
seo.keywords: MASO, RENAPROV, solidarity, Cameroon, health, education, social assistance, microfinance, financial inclusion

banner.line2: Simple membership: 500 FCFA + 100 FCFA/day. Benefit from all our advantages.

slide1.title: MASO – Together, let's break the cycle of poverty
slide1.description: An initiative of RENAPROV FINANCE SA that empowers Cameroonians through solidarity. With MASO, you benefit from direct advantages in health, education, social assistance and wellbeing.

slide2.title: Cameroonian solidarity that changes lives
slide2.description: MASO embodies the spirit of Cameroonian solidarity by creating a mutual support network that allows each member to benefit from essential services in health, education and social assistance.

slide3.title: With MASO, win your next prize
slide3.description: Take part in our draws and win vehicles, villas and more. MASO offers you the chance to achieve your dreams while benefiting from our solidarity services.

slide4.title: Win your villa with MASO
slide4.description: Take part in the great MASO lottery and try to win your next villa.

slide5.title: Simple and accessible membership conditions
slide5.description: Join MASO with just 500 FCFA for the booklet and 100 FCFA per day. An accessible contribution that opens the door to all our benefits and services.

slide6.title: Join our solidarity network
slide6.description: Become a MASO member and benefit from personalised support, training and a solidarity network that supports you in all your projects.

slide7.title: Join us
slide7.description: Be part of the RENAPROV community and benefit from a strong network that supports your ambitions. Whether you are an entrepreneur, employee or student.

product.title: MASO: Solidarity, assistance and opportunities for all
product.description: RENAPROV's MASO helps Cameroonians break out of the vicious circle of poverty by providing access to essential social services and unique opportunities.
product.benefit1: Health and Education – Up to 35% reduction on your fees
product.benefit2: Lottery & community – Win houses, motorcycles and funding while participating in a solidarity community
product.imageAlt: MASO - Solidarity, assistance and opportunities for all

solutions.headerDescription: Take part in our draws and win vehicles, villas and more. MASO offers you the chance to achieve your dreams while benefiting from our solidarity services.

prize1.title: Your funding
prize1.description: Benefit from zero-rate funding from 100,000 FCFA to 2,000,000 FCFA value, thanks to the MASO lottery

prize2.title: Personal Vehicles
prize2.description: Benefit from a personal vehicle worth 5,000,000 XAF, thanks to the MASO lottery

prize3.title: Taxi to win
prize3.description: Benefit from a taxi vehicle worth 4,000,000 XAF, thanks to the MASO lottery

prize4.title: Tricycle
prize4.description: Benefit from a tricycle worth 1,800,000 XAF, thanks to the MASO lottery

prize5.title: Your Villa
prize5.description: Benefit from a villa worth 30,000,000 XAF, thanks to the MASO lottery

item1.title: -35% on hospital care fees at La Mamu
item1.description: Make your deposits and withdrawals whenever you want, without constraints, for total control of your finances.

item2.title: Reduce your study fees and invest in your future
item2.description: Thanks to the partnership between RENAPROV and IUB, MASO members benefit from -20% on university fees.

item3.title: Win big with the MASO Lottery!
item3.description: Each member automatically participates in our solidarity lottery and can win houses, motorcycles, funding and more.

adhesion.title: Membership Conditions
adhesion.description: MASO membership is simple and open to all Cameroonians wishing to be part of a sustainable solidarity network.
adhesion.benefit1: Identity document – National ID, Passport, Residence permit, Refugee card, or valid Driver's licence
adhesion.benefit2: 500 FCFA for the booklet – One-time opening fee for your MASO member booklet
adhesion.benefit3: Contribution: 100 FCFA/day – Or 26,000 FCFA/year to benefit from all our advantages

newsletter.title: Subscribe to the newsletter
newsletter.description: Receive our news directly by email.

testimonials.cta: Learn more about our bank credit

items.name: Clarisse N.
items.quote: Thanks to MASO, I was able to open my shop in Bafoussam. Their support helped me get suitable financing and learn to manage my business well.

items.name: Jean-Paul M.
items.quote: MASO supported me in growing my business. Their expertise and proximity were essential to the success of my projects.

items.name: Marie K.
items.quote: With MASO's support, I was able to modernize my farm and increase my income. A true trusted partner.
